email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is October 15-20. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Would you consider $50.75 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the vessel’s availability and any demurrage terms? Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your prompt response. I understand your concern about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $51.25 per metric ton, which is competitive given the vessel’s specifications. Demurrage is set at $25,000 per day pro rata. The MV Ocean Star is confirmed available for your laycan. Let me know if this works. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised quote. We can agree to $51.25 per metric ton, provided the demurrage rate is reduced to $22,000 per day. Also, could you confirm the cargo size is 140,000 metric tons? Looking forward to your confirmation. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your reply. We can agree to the demurrage rate of $22,000 per day. The cargo size is confirmed at 140,000 metric tons. I’ll prepare the charter party agreement with these terms. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Please proceed with the charter party agreement. We’ll finalize the paperwork on our end. Thanks for your help, and let’s keep in touch for future shipments. Best, John.
